mapper.insert: insert into address(address_id, member_id, address_name, address_recipient_name, address_recipient_phone, address_default, address_postcode, main_address, address_reference, address_detail, address_myAddress) values(null, #{member_id}, #{address_name}, #{address_recipient_name}, #{address_recipient_phone}, #{address_default}, #{address_postcode}, #{main_address}, #{address_reference}, #{address_detail}, #{address_myAddress})
mapper.select: select * from address where member_id=#{member_id} and address_myAddress='yes'
select * from address where address_id= (select max(address_id) from address)
select * from address A join payment P on A.address_id=P.address_id where payment_id=(select max(payment_id) from payment where member_id=#{member_id})
select * from address where address_default=1 and member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.update: update address set address_myAddress='no' where address_id=#{address_id}
update address set address_default=0 where address_default=1 and member_id=#{member_id}
